title: Joyful Tidings at Nan Home - Novel Updates
tags: Businessmen   Childhood Friends   Cohabitation   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Loneliness   Love Rivals   Lovers Reunited   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Playboys   Popular Love Interests
author: Tian Tang   田唐
description:
There are six billion people on Earth and yet, we know each other. This is such a huge coincidence, so why don’t we be together?
You care about me just like how I care about you, so why don’t we be together?
I like you; coincidentally, you like me too. Since fate has brought us together, why don’t we be together?
The porridge today is so delicious, such a rare thing, why don’t we be together?
The weather today is pretty good, why don’t we be together?
That little dog is so cute, why don’t we be together?

Lu Nanxuan, for so many years now we have been just like two kids, running after and hiding from each other. I’ve grown old and am also tired. I can’t run after you anymore. Let us, properly and truly, be together…

And so, there were joyful tidings at Nan Home.>
